SEARCH
Package CAMSv2

Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
CAMSv2.BaseController<Student,StudentView>
CAMSv2.StudentController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CampCommitteeMemberController
public class StudentController extends BaseController<Student,StudentView>
This StudentController class represents the controller for the Student model. It extends the BaseController class and includes additional properties and methods specific to a Student.
Since:
13-11-2023

  • Method Details

    • startProgram

      public void startProgram()
      This method starts the program for the student. It displays the student menu and handles the student's choices.
      Specified by:
      startProgram in class BaseController<Student,StudentView>

    • handleStudentMenu

      protected boolean handleStudentMenu(int choice)
      This method handles the student's menu choices.
      Parameters:
      choice - The student's menu choice.
      Returns:
      true if the program should continue running, false otherwise.

    • enterEditEnquiry

      protected boolean enterEditEnquiry()
      This method handles the student's choice to view the remaining time slots for a camp.

    • enterDeleteEnquiry

      protected boolean enterDeleteEnquiry()
      This method handles the student's choice to delete an enquiry. It prompts the student for the enquiry ID and then deletes the enquiry.

    • handleCampSelection

      protected Camp handleCampSelection()
      This method handles the student's selection of a camp. It prompts the student for the camp name and sets the selected camp.
      Returns:
      true if the camp was successfully selected, false otherwise.

    • enterCampSpecificOptions

      protected boolean enterCampSpecificOptions()
      This method handles the student's selection of camp-specific options. It displays the camp-specific menu and handles the student's choices.
      Returns:
      true if the program should continue running, false otherwise.

    • handleSubmitEnquiryToCamp

      protected boolean handleSubmitEnquiryToCamp()
      This method handles the student's choice to submit an enquiry to a camp. It prompts the student for the enquiry description and then creates the enquiry.

    • handleViewRemainingTimeSlots

      protected boolean handleViewRemainingTimeSlots()
      This method handles the student's choice to view the remaining time slots for a camp.

    • handleCampSpecificOptions

    • enterCampWithdrawal

      This method handles the student's choice to withdraw from a camp.

    • enterCampRegister

      protected boolean enterCampRegister(GoToMainMenu goToMainMenu)
      This method handles the student's choice to enter the camp registration process.
      Parameters:
      goToMainMenu - this is a object that is being passed to tell the program to exit back to main menu.
      Returns:
      true if the registration was successful, false otherwise.
